enhanced_by.reason: Both methods perform validation on the input string, ensuring it meets the required length criteria.
Both methods check if the input string is null or blank, ensuring the input is valid before proceeding.
The calculate method for ISBN-10 is directly invoked when the input code length is 9, indicating a strong functional dependency.
The calculate method for ISBN-13 is directly invoked when the input code length is 12, indicating a strong functional dependency.
